label: A2B4CD_tI16_82_ac_g_b_d-001
title: Kesterite [Cu$_{2}$(Zn,Fe)SnS$_{4}$] Structure
comments: The kesterite structure is related to the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC4D_tI16_121_d_a_i_b-001}{stannite} structure, with differences occurring due to the positioning of the Cu atoms (Hall, 1978). The (2b) Wyckoff position is partially occupied with iron and zinc. We label this site Zn.
